meanings.definition: In a manner that has a very unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The garbage was disposed of malodorously.
meanings.sent3: The skunk sprayed malodorously, causing everyone to run away.
meanings.sent4: The stench filled the room malodorously, like a cloud of foulness.
meanings.sent5: The rotten eggs smelled malodorously, making everyone gag.

meanings.sent1: The malodorously trash bin needed to be emptied immediately.
meanings.sent2: The malodorously socks were left on the floor for days.
meanings.sent3: The malodorously cheese made the whole fridge stink.
meanings.sent4: The malodorously alley behind the restaurant was avoided by all.
meanings.sent5: The malodorously swamp was home to many unseen creatures.
